boardgame.name: Goblini s.r.o.
Goblins, Inc.
Корпорация Гоблинов
boardgame.description: Goblins, Inc. is a corporation dedicated to building unstoppable giant doomsday robots, and it's looking for a new Boss. Do you have what it takes?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Team up with your greed-driven fellow goblins and build the ultimate doomsday robot. Meet other teams in epic battles and blow them up, but always remember, only one goblin can win because there is no _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;G_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; in team work!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game plays over two rounds in which you partner up with each of your fellow players to try to build the ultimate giant doomsday robot _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but the other players don't know which hidden agendas you must complete to impress the Boss! During the four phases of the round, the teams take turns designing, building and piloting their robots in order to destroy the other team and get one step closer to becoming the next Boss of Goblins, Inc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: DdJ 016. Los juegos de Protos y Tipos. Finde Naranja.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

played twice - the front of the box is slightly dented from other games being stored on top. it is more noticeable to the touch than to the eye. not sure if it is clear from the photos. - the yellow sandbagger agenda card seems to be missing. I think the impact on game balance and enjoyment would be negligible but it does make the game technically incomplete. - there are some promo agenda cards included as well. payment by bank transfer (IBAN) preferred.
